verblex: 1. Of a dog or animal, to make a low rumbling noise, usually because it is angry. English = growl.
2. Of a dog, to make a short, loud noise once or several times. English = bark.
nomlex: 1. A low rumbling noise made by a dog or other animal, usually because it is angry. English = growl.
2. A short, loud noise, made by a dog once or several times. English = bark.
